original: @52b / /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽dpang skong phyag brgya @53a *//
analyzed: @52b / /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo // dpang skong phyag brgya @53a *//
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels.

original: pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Hundred Homage Confession

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa rab 'byams ma lus pa'i dkon mchog thams cad la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa rab 'byams ma lus pa'i dkon mchog thams cad la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the buddhas, bodhisattvas, noble disciples, and pratyekabuddhas in the ten directions and three times.

original: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the buddhas in the ten directions.

original: shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo // lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha Ratnasaṃbhava in the east.🔽Homage to the Buddha Aśokaprabhāsa in the south.

original: nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha Ratnaprabhāsa in the west.

original: byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha Jina-Indra,

original: byang shar mtshams kyi sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang shar mtshams kyi sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha Samadhi-Hasti-Suddha-Sriprabha,

original: shar lho mtshams kyi sangs rgyas padmo dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽lho nub mtshams kyi sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: shar lho mtshams kyi sangs rgyas padmo dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo // lho nub mtshams kyi sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha Padma-Suddha-Sriprabha,🔽Homage to the Buddha Surya-Mandala-Aloka-Suddha-Sriprabha,

original: nub byang mtshams kyi sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas padmo'i dpal de bzhin @53b gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: nub byang mtshams kyi sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo // 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas padmo'i dpal de bzhin @53b gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha Chattra-Suddha-Sriprabha,🔽Homage to the Buddha Padma-Suddha-Sriprabha,

original: bla ma phyogs kyi sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bla ma phyogs kyi sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha Nanda-Sriprabha,

original: yang shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: yang shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha Akṣobhya in the east.

original: lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo // nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha Ratnasaṃbhava in the south.🔽Homage to the Buddha Amitābha in the west.

original: byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas don yod grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde dga' ba'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas don yod grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo // sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde dga' ba'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha Amoghasiddhi in the north.🔽Homage to the Buddha Śākyamuni.

original: sangs rgyas tshe mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas tshe mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha Amitāyus.

original: sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo; ;sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bee d'urya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo; ;sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bee d'urya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha Akṣobhya. Homage to the Buddha Bhaiṣajyaguru-vaiḍūryaprabharāja.

original: sangs rgyas s'a la'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas s'a la'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha, the Tathāgata, the King of the Lord of the Blossoming Flowers of the Buddha Land.

original: sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha, the Tathāgata, the Sage of the Śākya Clan.🔽Homage to the Buddha, the Tathāgata, the King of the Splendor of Jewels.

original: sangs rgyas rin po che'i dpal gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo; ;sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin po che'i dpal gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo; ;sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha, the Tathāgata, the Ever-Excellent.

original: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽sangs rgyas autpa la @54a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo // sangs rgyas autpa la @54a *//
translated: Homage to the Buddha, the Tathāgata, the Illuminator.

original: rgyas pa bsung gi tog gi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rgyas pa bsung gi tog gi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha, the Tathāgata, the Lotus Blossoming Fragrance Banner King.

original: ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyi 'jig rten na //
analyzed: ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyi 'jig rten na //
translated: In the world of the Saffron Victory Banner,

original: sangs rgyas rdo rje snying pos rab tu 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rdo rje snying pos rab tu 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha, the Tathāgata, the Subduer by the Vajra Essence.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bsgrags pa'i 'jig rten na /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bsgrags pa'i 'jig rten na /
translated: In the world where the irreversible wheel is proclaimed,

original: sangs rgyas rab tu gdon mi za ba padmo rgyas pa'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rab tu gdon mi za ba padmo rgyas pa'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha Supratiṣṭhita­padma­garbha­kāya.

original: rdul med pa'i 'jig rten na /
analyzed: rdul med pa'i 'jig rten na /
translated: In the world called Viraja,

original: sangs rgyas seng ge de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas seng ge de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha Siṃha.

original: rab tu snang ba'i 'jig rten na /
analyzed: rab tu snang ba'i 'jig rten na /
translated: In the world called Suprabhāsa,

original: sangs rgyas rin po che'i gtsug phud de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin po che'i gtsug phud de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha Ratna­cūḍa.

original: 'od bzang po'i 'jig rten na /
analyzed: 'od bzang po'i 'jig rten na /
translated: In the world called Su­prabhāsa,🔽Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha Vairocana.

original: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo; ;'da' bar dka' ba'i 'jig rten na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo; ;'da' bar dka' ba'i 'jig rten na /
translated: In the world called Duratikramā,

original: sangs rgyas chos kyi 'od zer rab tu rgyas pa'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos kyi 'od zer rab tu rgyas pa'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha Dharma­raśmi­pūrṇa­kāya.

original: rab tu bzang po'i 'jig rten na /
analyzed: rab tu bzang po'i 'jig rten na /
translated: In the world called Subhadra,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i blo gros 'od zer gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i blo gros 'od zer gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha Sarvajña­mati­raśmi­rāja.

original: me long gi dkyil 'khor bsgrags pa'i 'jig rten na /
analyzed: me long gi dkyil 'khor bsgrags pa'i 'jig rten na /
translated: In the world called Mirror Disk,

original: sangs rgyas zla ba'i thugs de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zla ba'i thugs de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha Moon Mind.🔽In the world called Lotus Glory,

original: padmo dpal gyi 'jig rten na sangs rgyas dpal bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar thams cad la phyag 'tshal @54b lo //
analyzed: padmo dpal gyi 'jig rten na sangs rgyas dpal bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar thams cad la phyag 'tshal @54b lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha Good Glory.

original: sangs rgyas zla 'od de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zla 'od de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha Moon Light.

original: sangs rgyas mdzes chen de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mdzes chen de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha Great Beauty.

original: sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi dkyil 'khor dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi dkyil 'khor dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha King of the Lord of the World’s Mandala.

original: sangs rgyas dga' ba'i spyan de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dga' ba'i spyan de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha Joyful Eyes.

original: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha Ocean Glory.

original: sangs rgyas gser gyi gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gser gyi gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha Golden Form.

original: sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i yon tan gyi 'od zer de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i yon tan gyi 'od zer de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha of Infinite Qualities’ Light Rays.

original: sangs rgyas smon lam thams cad las byung ba'i rin po che'i gzi brjid shin tu 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas smon lam thams cad las byung ba'i rin po che'i gzi brjid shin tu 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha of the Most Noble King of Jewels Arisen from All Aspirations.

original: sangs rgyas grags pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas grags pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha of the King of Sounds of Renown.

original: sangs rgyas ye shes rdo rje'i rgya mtsho'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ye shes rdo rje'i rgya mtsho'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha of the Ocean Lord of the Vajra of Wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽sangs rgyas gtsug tor can de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo // sangs rgyas gtsug tor can de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo // sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha Vipaśyin.🔽Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha Śikhin.🔽Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha Viśvabhū.

original: sangs rgyas log par dad sel de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas log par dad sel de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Buddha Krakucchanda.

original: sangs rgyas gser thub de bzhin gshegs @55a *//🔽pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gser thub de bzhin gshegs @55a *// pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha Kanakamuni Tathāgata.

original: sangs rgyas 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha Kāśyapa Tathāgata.

original: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all past Buddhas.

original: da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all present Buddhas.

original: ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all future Buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i dpal rnam par snang mdzad chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dpal rnam par snang mdzad chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the glorious bodhisattvas, the great Vairocana.

original: sangs rgyas chos kyi sku mu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos kyi sku mu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the boundless Dharma body of the Buddha.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i sku gzugs thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽ring bsrel thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i sku gzugs thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo // ring bsrel thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the forms in infinite world systems.🔽Homage to all relics.

original: mchod rten thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mchod rten thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all stūpas.

original: dam pa'i chos mdo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos mdo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Sūtra Piṭaka of the sublime Dharma.

original: dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo; ;lung du bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽tshigs su bcad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽ched du brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo; ;lung du bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo // tshigs su bcad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo // ched du brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the verses.🔽Homage to the exclamations.

original: gleng gzhi'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽'das pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gleng gzhi'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo // rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo // 'das pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the narratives.🔽Homage to the parables.

original: skyes pa rabs kyi sde la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽shin tu rgyas pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: skyes pa rabs kyi sde la phyag 'tshal lo // shin tu rgyas pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the accounts of past lives.🔽Homage to the extensive teachings.

original: rmad du byung ba'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rmad du byung ba'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the marvelous events.

original: chos rtogs pa bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: chos rtogs pa bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the teachings on realization.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod theg pa chen po'i mdzod thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod theg pa chen po'i mdzod thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the entire canon of the bodhisattvas, the treasury of the Great Vehicle.

original: phyogs @55b bcu dus gsum gyi gsung rab thams cad dang / 'dul ba thabs kyi sgo mo ma lus pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: phyogs @55b bcu dus gsum gyi gsung rab thams cad dang / 'dul ba thabs kyi sgo mo ma lus pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to all the scriptures of the ten directions and three times, and to all the doors of methods for taming without exception.

original: chos kyi dbyings yang dag pa'i mtha' brjod du med pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings yang dag pa'i mtha' brjod du med pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the inexpressible perfect limit of the dharmadhatu.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te dam pa'i chos kyi yi ge thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te dam pa'i chos kyi yi ge thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the mother of all tathagatas, the perfection of wisdom, and to all the letters of the sublime Dharma, such as the perfection of wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the bodhisattva mahasattva Vairocana.

original: shar phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: shar phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the bodhisattva Samantaraśmi of the eastern direction.

original: lho phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med pas byin la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: lho phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med pas byin la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the bodhisattva Aśokadatta of the southern direction.

original: nub phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: nub phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the bodhisattva Cāritramati of the western direction.

original: byang phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rgyal bas byin la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rgyal bas byin la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva Victorious Gift in the north.

original: byang shar mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang shar mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva Victorious Subduer in the northeast.

original: shar lho mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' lag na padmo la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: shar lho mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' lag na padmo la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva Lotus in Hand in the southeast.

original: lho nub mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽nub byang mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: lho nub mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo // nub byang mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva Sun of Radiance in the southwest.🔽Homage to the bodhisattva Supreme Jewel in the northwest.

original: 'og gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' pad mo dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'og gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' pad mo dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva Holy Lotus in the nadir.

original: bla ma phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas byin la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽byang chub sems @56a *//
analyzed: bla ma phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas byin la phyag 'tshal lo // byang chub sems @56a *//
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva Gift of Joy in the zenith.

original: dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva Avalokiteśvara.

original: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva Maitreya.

original: byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva Ākāśagarbha.

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva Samantabhadra.

original: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva Mañjuśrī.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva Sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva Kṣitigarbha.

original: byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva Vimalakīrti.

original: byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva Mahāsthāmaprāpta.

original: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the bodhisattva mahāsattvas of the three times and ten directions.

original: shes rab chen po'i mchog 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: shes rab chen po'i mchog 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Śāriputra, the supreme one of great wisdom.

original: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i mchog 'phags pa moonggal gyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i mchog 'phags pa moonggal gyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Maudgalyāyana, the supreme one of great miracles.

original: mang du thos pa'i mchog 'phags pa kun dga' bo la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi mchog 'phags pa 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mang du thos pa'i mchog 'phags pa kun dga' bo la phyag 'tshal lo // sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi mchog 'phags pa 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Ānanda, the supreme one of great learning.🔽Homage to the noble Kāśyapa, the supreme one of ascetic practices.🔽Homage to the noble Yaśas, the supreme one who respects the precepts.

original: bslab pa la gus pa'i mchog 'phags pa nor sbyin 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog 'phags pa nye bar 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bslab pa la gus pa'i mchog 'phags pa nor sbyin 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo // 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog 'phags pa nye bar 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Upāli, the supreme one who upholds the Vinaya.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan mnga' ba'i mchog 'phags pa ma @56b 'gags pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan mnga' ba'i mchog 'phags pa ma @56b 'gags pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Aniruddha, the supreme one with the eye of miracles.

original: 'dri zhing lan ldon pa'i mchog 'phags pa rab 'byor la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'dri zhing lan ldon pa'i mchog 'phags pa rab 'byor la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Subhūti, the supreme one who asks questions and gives answers.

original: 'phags pa dgra bcom pa'i dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa dgra bcom pa'i dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the noble arhat saṅghas.

original: 'phags pa rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the noble pratyekabuddhas.

original: phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun bzhugs so 'tshal thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun bzhugs so 'tshal thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the saṅghas of the ten directions.

original: dkon mchog gsum la dad pas phyag btsal nas //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la dad pas phyag btsal nas //
translated: Having paid homage with faith in the Three Jewels,

original: sdig pa kun byang dge tshogs rnam par 'phel //
analyzed: sdig pa kun byang dge tshogs rnam par 'phel //
translated: all misdeeds are purified and the accumulation of virtue increases.

original: bcom ldan so so'i bka' las ci 'byung ba //
analyzed: bcom ldan so so'i bka' las ci 'byung ba //
translated: Whatever comes from the individual words of the Blessed One,

original: yon tan khyad par can de grub par shog /
analyzed: yon tan khyad par can de grub par shog /
translated: may those special qualities be accomplished.

original: phyogs bcu'i dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels of the ten directions.

original: bstod cing bsngags so //
analyzed: bstod cing bsngags so //
translated: I praise and extol them.

original: blta zhing brtag go /
analyzed: blta zhing brtag go /
translated: I look and examine them.🔽The various supreme,🔽chief,🔽excellent,🔽special,🔽good,🔽and sublime

original: byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams rab 'byams las byung ba mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs mchog /🔽gtso bo / dam pa; khyad par can /🔽bzang po / gya nom pa /🔽bla na med pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams rab 'byams las byung ba mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs mchog / gtso bo / dam pa; khyad par can / bzang po / gya nom pa / bla na med pa /
translated: offerings, equal to the unequaled, arising from the bodhisattvas' boundless merit,

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas phyogs bcu'i snod kyi 'jig rten byur bur bkang ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas phyogs bcu'i snod kyi 'jig rten byur bur bkang ste /
translated: are filled to the brim in the worldly realms of the ten directions.

original: chos kyi mchod pa dang bcas pas ma lus /
analyzed: chos kyi mchod pa dang bcas pas ma lus /
translated: Along with the offering of Dharma, they are offered to all without exception.

original: mi lus / lus pa med pa'i dkon mchog gsum la phyi ma'i mu'i mthar rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod cing 'don to //🔽dbul zhing gsol lo //
analyzed: mi lus / lus pa med pa'i dkon mchog gsum la phyi ma'i mu'i mthar rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod cing 'don to // dbul zhing gsol lo //
translated: I make offerings to the Three Jewels, without exception, continuously and forever.🔽I give to them.

original: bkur stir bgyi'o //🔽bla mar bgyi'o //🔽ri mor bgyi'o //
analyzed: bkur stir bgyi'o // bla mar bgyi'o // ri mor bgyi'o //
translated: I honor them.🔽I respect them.🔽I revere them.

original: mnyes par bgyi'o //🔽bdag cag gi skye ba 'di dang / thog ma dang / tha ma ma mchis pa nas srid pa gsum gyi 'khor ba na 'khor zhing 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug @57a *//
analyzed: mnyes par bgyi'o // bdag cag gi skye ba 'di dang / thog ma dang / tha ma ma mchis pa nas srid pa gsum gyi 'khor ba na 'khor zhing 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug @57a *//
translated: I delight in them.

original: gsum gyi dbang gis lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sgo nas mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga la sogs te /
analyzed: gsum gyi dbang gis lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sgo nas mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga la sogs te /
translated: In this life and in all our lives, without beginning or end, as we have wandered through the three realms of samsara, under the power of attachment, aversion, and bewilderment, we have committed the ten unvirtuous actions and the five boundless transgressions, through body, speech, and mind.

original: gsung rab kun las 'gal ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag gis ci bgyis pa dang / gzhan la bcol ba dang / gzhan bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag rdul tsam bag tsam yang ma lus par mthol zhing bshags so; ;sbyangs zhing bsal to //
analyzed: gsung rab kun las 'gal ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag gis ci bgyis pa dang / gzhan la bcol ba dang / gzhan bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag rdul tsam bag tsam yang ma lus par mthol zhing bshags so; ;sbyangs zhing bsal to //
translated: all that I have urged others to do, and all that I have rejoiced in others doing, without exception, even down to the smallest amount, even down to the smallest particle.

original: gzhig cing gdon to //🔽mi 'chab bo //🔽mi sbed do //
analyzed: gzhig cing gdon to // mi 'chab bo // mi sbed do //
translated: I confess them, purify them, and dispel them.🔽I destroy them and cast them out.🔽I do not conceal them.🔽I do not hide them.

original: mi bsnyen mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mi bsnyen mi bgyid do //
translated: I do not hold on to them.

original: de nas de'i tshe sdig pa thams cad ni byang /
analyzed: de nas de'i tshe sdig pa thams cad ni byang /
translated: Then at that time, all misdeeds are purified,🔽and all merit is perfected.

original: bsod nams thams cad ni rdzogs te; dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du /
analyzed: bsod nams thams cad ni rdzogs te; dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du /
translated: From this time forth until I reach the essence of enlightenment,🔽except for emanations intentionally emanated by the power of my intention,

original: dgongs pa'i dbang gis ched du sprul pa ma gtogs par nam nam zhar zhar tshe tshe rabs rabs su ngan song gsum la sogs te /
analyzed: dgongs pa'i dbang gis ched du sprul pa ma gtogs par nam nam zhar zhar tshe tshe rabs rabs su ngan song gsum la sogs te /
translated: may I never be born in the three lower realms and so forth,

original: bgegs rigs thams cad du mi skye zhing mi ltung bar shog cig /
analyzed: bgegs rigs thams cad du mi skye zhing mi ltung bar shog cig /
translated: and may I never fall into the various types of obstacles.

original: log pa mi dge ba'i las la mi phyogs mi bgyid par shog cig /
analyzed: log pa mi dge ba'i las la mi phyogs mi bgyid par shog cig /
translated: May I never turn to or engage in negative, unwholesome actions.

original: las dang / nyon mongs pa'i rgyu la mi phyogs mi bgyid par shog cig /
analyzed: las dang / nyon mongs pa'i rgyu la mi phyogs mi bgyid par shog cig /
translated: May I never go against the causes of karma and the afflictions.

original: smad pa'i lus dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu kun las thar nas phyin chad mi myong bar shog cig /
analyzed: smad pa'i lus dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu kun las thar nas phyin chad mi myong bar shog cig /
translated: May I be liberated from all the results of this contemptible body and suffering and never experience them again.

original: dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du sgo gsum nas dge ba chu bo'i rgyun bzhin du rgyun mi 'chad par shog cig /
analyzed: dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du sgo gsum nas dge ba chu bo'i rgyun bzhin du rgyun mi 'chad par shog cig /
translated: From this time forth until I reach the essence of enlightenment, may I never be separated from the practice of virtue, which flows from me like a river.

original: tshe rabs gar skye sa kyang bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te sems can @57b thams cad kyi don bya la mthu dang / dbang yod par shog cig /
analyzed: tshe rabs gar skye sa kyang bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te sems can @57b thams cad kyi don bya la mthu dang / dbang yod par shog cig /
translated: Wherever I am born in all my lives, may I have perfect happiness and be powerful and influential in working for the benefit of all beings.

original: gang de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba' zhig gi thugs su chud pa'i chos bla na med pa'i byang chub tu gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya ba'i don de kho na nyid gang yin pa deng dag gis kyang ma nor bar kheng du chud cing bsgoms la gzhan dag la'ang
analyzed: gang de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba' zhig gi thugs su chud pa'i chos bla na med pa'i byang chub tu gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya ba'i don de kho na nyid gang yin pa deng dag gis kyang ma nor bar kheng du chud cing bsgoms la gzhan dag la'ang
translated: May I and all others realize and meditate on the ultimate reality that is the sole domain of the tathagatas, the very meaning of enlightenment, which is free of error and doubt.

original: ma nor bar ston cing 'dren par shog cig /
analyzed: ma nor bar ston cing 'dren par shog cig /
translated: May I be able to teach and guide without error.

original: dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi ste /
analyzed: dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi ste /
translated: From this time forth, until I reach the essence of enlightenment, I go for refuge to the Three Jewels.

original: bdag nyid lus dbul gyi /
analyzed: bdag nyid lus dbul gyi /
translated: I offer myself to them.

original: thugs rje chen po ldan pa rnams kyis so so nas rtag tu bzhes shig /
analyzed: thugs rje chen po ldan pa rnams kyis so so nas rtag tu bzhes shig /
translated: May those who possess great compassion each accept me and always keep me.

original: ji ltar na dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dngos po thams cad dang bral ba phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyis ma zin pa'i chos bdag med pa dang mnyam pa /
analyzed: ji ltar na dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dngos po thams cad dang bral ba phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyis ma zin pa'i chos bdag med pa dang mnyam pa /
translated: Just as the buddhas of the three times and the bodhisattvas, free from all things, not caught up in the aggregates, elements, and sense-fields, are equal to the selfless nature of phenomena,

original: thog ma nas ma skyes pa /
analyzed: thog ma nas ma skyes pa /
translated: unborn from the beginning,

original: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ltar bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ltar bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang /
translated: and arouse the mind of awakening through the nature of emptiness, so I, by the name of so-and-so,

original: dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
analyzed: dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
translated: from this time forth, until I reach the essence of enlightenment, will arouse the mind of awakening.

original: byang chub kyi sems ni nam gzhar yang mi stor zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa de dang nam yang mi 'bral bar shog cig /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems ni nam gzhar yang mi stor zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa de dang nam yang mi 'bral bar shog cig /
translated: May I never lose the thought of enlightenment, and may I never be separated from the holy spiritual friend.

original: ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas de dag bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba ltar bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams thams cad la rjes @58a *//🔽su yi rang ngo //
analyzed: ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas de dag bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba ltar bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams thams cad la rjes @58a *// su yi rang ngo //
translated: Just as the Buddhas of the three times rejoice in the unsurpassed merit, so I, by the name of so-and-so, rejoice in all the merit of the world and of the world beyond.

original: nam 'chi bar nges pa'i dus de na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi zhal mngon sum du mthong nas phyag g-yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste bdag gi spyi bor bzhag nas lung nod par gyur cig /
analyzed: nam 'chi bar nges pa'i dus de na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi zhal mngon sum du mthong nas phyag g-yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste bdag gi spyi bor bzhag nas lung nod par gyur cig /
translated: When the time comes for me to die, may I see the faces of all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas, and may they extend their right hands, which are the color of gold, and place them upon my head, and may they prophesy my future enlightenment.

original: bdag gis kyang nyon mongs pas sems mi 'khrul par chos bdag med pa dang mthun pa'i 'dun pa can dang / byang chub kyi sems tshad med pa dang ldan bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par shog cig /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang nyon mongs pas sems mi 'khrul par chos bdag med pa dang mthun pa'i 'dun pa can dang / byang chub kyi sems tshad med pa dang ldan bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par shog cig /
translated: May I too, with a mind untroubled by afflictive emotions, with a yearning for the absence of self in phenomena, and with the boundless mind of awakening, meet my death.

original: mdor na bag chags ma lus kun byang nas //
analyzed: mdor na bag chags ma lus kun byang nas //
translated: In short, may all my habitual patterns be purified without exception,

original: bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis yongs rdzogs te //
analyzed: bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis yongs rdzogs te //
translated: and may I perfect the two accumulations of merit and wisdom.

original: 'gro ba ma lus byin gyis bsgral ba'i phyir //
analyzed: 'gro ba ma lus byin gyis bsgral ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to liberate all beings without exception,

original: bdag nyid myur du mngon par sangs rgyas shog /
analyzed: bdag nyid myur du mngon par sangs rgyas shog /
translated: may I swiftly attain full buddhahood.

original: dpang skong phyag brgya pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: dpang skong phyag brgya pa rdzogs so //
translated: The Hundred-Verse Confession is complete.

original: bod du dam pa'i chos 'byung ba'i snga ltas su lha tho tho ri snyan shal gyi sku ring la pho brang yum bu bla mkhar du nam mkha' las babs /
analyzed: bod du dam pa'i chos 'byung ba'i snga ltas su lha tho tho ri snyan shal gyi sku ring la pho brang yum bu bla mkhar du nam mkha' las babs /
translated: In Tibet, as a portent of the coming of the holy Dharma, a text fell from the sky onto the palace of Yumbu Lagang during the reign of Lha Thothori Nyentsen.

original: mi rabs lnga na 'di'i don shes pa 'ong zhes rmi lam du lung bstan te chos kyi dbu brnyes so //
analyzed: mi rabs lnga na 'di'i don shes pa 'ong zhes rmi lam du lung bstan te chos kyi dbu brnyes so //
translated: “ Five generations from now, someone will appear who will understand this text,” the text itself prophesied in a dream. Thus, the Dharma was introduced.
